original_text: And what will happen to you people in Capernaum? You think that God will lift you up to heaven, do you? No! He will throw you down to Hades, the place for dead people!’
korean_text: 가버나움아 네가 하늘에까지 높아지겠느냐 음부에까지 낮아지리라

sentences.original_text: And what will happen to you people in Capernaum?
sentences.korean_translation: 가버나움에 있는 너희 백성들에게 무슨 일이 일어날까?

sentences.original_text: You think that God will lift you up to heaven, do you?
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 하나님이 너희를 하늘로 들어 올릴 것이라고 생각하느냐?

sentences.original_text: He will throw you down to Hades,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 너희를 헤데스로 던져 내릴 것이다,
